meanings.definition: A benign tumor composed of muscle tissue.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that myomata are non-cancerous growths made of muscle tissue.
meanings.sent2: She had surgery to remove the myomata from her uterus.
meanings.sent3: The myomata in her leg decided to have a dance party, but they couldn't move much!
meanings.sent4: Her myomata were like tiny muscle mountains growing inside her.
meanings.sent5: The myomata looked like little muscle balls under the microscope.

meanings.sent1: The doctor discussed the myomata found in her medical report.
meanings.sent2: The myomata in the museum exhibit were fascinating to study.
meanings.sent3: The myomata at the party all wore tiny name tags to avoid confusion.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of myomata books filled the entire shelf.
meanings.sent5: The myomata on the map marked the locations of all the myoma cases.
